channel.title: Is an if statement a good way to make things?
channel.description: Well, I always think of codes, but every time I think of a code, it's an [i]if[/i] statement. Later, I figured out that some of my if statements are [b]booleans[/b]. Is it bad to replace [b]booleans[/b] for [i]if[/i]s?

item.title: Is an if statement a good way to make things?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Booleans are used for 2 different choices, true and false. Use booleans when you need and then if and then statements any other time.

Read full topic
item.source: Is an if statement a good way to make things?
